Translations.Text: And has the news of the disputants come to you, when they climbed the wall of the private chamber

when they entered before David, and he was horrified of them? They said, “Do not fear, we are two disputants, one of us has wronged the other, so decide between us with justice and do not act unjustly and guide us to the balanced path
This brother of mine, certainly has ninety and nine ewes and I have (only) one ewe, so he says: Entrust it to me; and shows his might on me in the affair.”

He (David) said, “He has been unjust to you by demanding your ewe (to be added) to his ewes and many of the partners certainly wrong one another, except those who believe and do righteous works, and their (number) is small.” And David guessed that We had tested him, so he sought the protective forgiveness of his Lord and fell down bowing and turned (to God)
So We protectively forgave him that, and certainly, with Us is nearness for him and a beautiful place of return

O David! We have made you a successor (to rule) in the earth so judge between mankind with justice and do not follow (your) desire lest it lead you astray from the way of God. Those who go astray from the way of God, for them there is certainly a severe punishment because they forgot the day of account

And We did not create the sky and the earth and whatever is between them in vain, that is the opinion of those who do not believe, so sorrowful will be the state of those who do not believe, due to the fire
Shall We make those who believe and do righteous works like those who cause corruption in the earth? Shall We make those who keep themselves in limits like those who exceed the limits
A blessed book which We have sent down to you that they may reflect over its signs and that those who understand may be mindful
And We granted to David, Solomon an excellent servant, he was certainly of those who turned (to God)
When (horses of high breed, which were) still when standing and swift while running, were presented to him in the evening, the evening
he said, “ I certainly preferred the love of good things to the remembrance of my Lord, to the extent that the (sun) was hidden behind the veil
bring them back to me, “ then he began to pass his hand over (their) legs and necks
And We indeed tried Solomon and We put on his throne a body, then he turned (to God)
He said, “ My Lord! protectively forgive me and grant me (such) a kingdom (the like of) which will not be possible for anyone (to have) after me. You are certainly the One Who grants.”
So We subjected to his (service) the wind, to move softly by his command, to which ever place he desired
and the devils, every builder and diver
and others linked together in chains
This is Our gift, so show favor or withhold, without account
And certainly, with Us is nearness for him and a beautiful place of return
And mention (about) Our servant Job, when he prayed to his Lord, “The devil has afflicted me with toil and torment.”
(It was said to him), “Strike with your foot, this (water which thereby gushes out, is for a) cool bath and a drink.”
And We granted to him his people and the like of them along with them, a mercy from Us and a reminder for men of understanding

(It was further said), “Take in your hand a bundle of twigs (of herbs) then strike with it and do not disobey. We certainly found him patient, an excellent servant, he was certainly one who turned (to God)
And mention (about) Our servants Abraham and Isaac and Jacob men of strength and insight
We had purified them for the exclusive reminding of the home (of the hereafter)
And they are with Us, among those chosen from the doers of good
And mention (about) Ishmael and Elisha and Ezekiel and all were from among the doers of good
This is a reminder, and for those who guard (against evil), there is a beautiful place of return
gardens of everlasting bliss, the doors of which will be kept open for them
reclining therein, they will therein call for many fruits and drinks
